Class DisplayThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • searchsort.DisplayThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class DisplayThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Thread-based class that periodically refreshes the panel with the bars at the bottom of the screen.
    Author:
    harlanhowe
